console.extensions.emailTemplates.description: This email is sent when the organization admin reinitiates password reset for a user
This email notifies the user that password reset is successfully completed
This email notifies the user that the organization admin has requested a password reset.
This email notifies the user that a login from a new device is detected
This email notifies the user that their account is unlocked by the organization admin
This email is used to request the user to confirm their email address for the new account
This email is sent when the user has requested a password reset
This email is sent to request a password from the user when the new account is created
This email notifies the user that their account is now unlocked (Time-Based)
This email sends the Magic Link to the user
This email notifies the user that the account is locked by the organization admin
This email notifies the user that the account is locked by due to too many failed login attempts
This email notifies the user that the account is now enabled
This email is used to re-send the notification to confirm user's email address
This email resends the Email OTP to a user
This email sends the Email OTP to a user
This email is used to request the user to confirm their email address
This email is sent when a user account needs to be recovered
This email is used to sent a temporary password to the user
This email is used to sent a One-Time Password (OTP) to the user
This email is sent when the organization admin re-initiates the request for a new user password.
This email is sent when the organization admin re-initiates the forced password reset for a user

console.extensions.emailTemplates.displayName: Admin Forced Password Reset with OTP
console.extensions.emailTemplates.description: This email is sent when the organization admin initiates the forced password reset for a user with OTP

console.extensions.emailTemplates.displayName: Resend Admin Forced Password Reset with OTP
console.extensions.emailTemplates.description: This email is sent when the organization admin reinitiates the forced password reset for a user with OTP
This email notifies the user that the account activation is successful
This email is sent when the user initiates a password reset
This email is sent when the user account is idle for a configured amount of time
This email is sent when the user changes the email address
This email informs the user that the email address is updated
This email informs the user that the email address is updated
This email is used to sent a Time-Based One-Time Password (TOTP) to the user
This email confirms the organization registration
This email is used to confirm a Lite User's email address
This email is used to re-send the notification to confirm a Lite User's email address
This email is used to re-send the notification to verify the email address update
This email is sent when the user successfully signs up
This email is sent when the user signs up
This email is sent when the organization admin invites a user to the organization
This email is sent to the impersonated user when the impersonation session is started
